faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Kaia

q1.question: Is Kaia free?
q1.answer: Yes, Kaia is completely free during the MVP phase. We will offer premium plans in the future with advanced features.

q2.question: Is it available on iOS?
q2.answer: Currently only on Android. The iOS version is in development and will be available soon.

q3.question: Does Kaia work offline?
q3.answer: Some basic functions work offline. AI and messaging features require an internet connection.

q4.question: Is my data safe?
q4.answer: Absolutely. We use end-to-end encryption and don't share your data with third parties. Your privacy is our priority.

q5.question: Can I sync with Google Calendar?
q5.answer: This feature is in development and will be available in upcoming updates.

q6.question: Does Kaia drain the battery?
q6.answer: No. Kaia is optimized to use minimal resources and preserve your device's battery.

fullDescription.title: Full Description
fullDescription.intro: Kaia's smart event management revolutionizes the way you organize your day-to-day life. With advanced AI technology, Kaia not only records your events but understands the complete context: location, duration, participants, and priority.
fullDescription.details: Using natural language processing, you can create complex events with a simple voice command. Kaia automatically extracts all relevant information: date, time, location, and even detects conflicts with other events in your schedule. The app learns from your patterns and suggests the best times to schedule activities based on your usual routine.

howToUse.title: How to find this feature in your Kaia app?
howToUse.subtitle: Follow these steps to access and use event management:

step1.title: Open the Kaia app
step1.description: Sign in to your Kaia account. If it's your first time, complete the registration process which only takes a few minutes.

step2.title: Go to the 'Agenda' section
step2.description: On the main screen, tap the calendar icon in the bottom navigation bar. Here you'll see all your scheduled events.

step3.title: Create a new event
step3.description: Press the '+' button or use the voice command by saying 'Kaia, create an event'. Naturally speak the event details, for example: 'Meeting with the team tomorrow at 3 PM at the office'.

step4.title: Confirm and manage
step4.description: Kaia will process your request and show you the extracted details. Confirm or edit as needed. Your events sync automatically and you'll receive smart reminders.

feature1.title: Automatic Location Context
feature1.description: Kaia automatically detects addresses and places mentioned in your voice commands, integrating with Google Maps for precise location suggestions.

feature2.title: Conflict Detection
feature2.description: The AI reviews your entire schedule and immediately alerts you if you try to schedule an event that overlaps with another existing commitment.

feature3.title: Smart Reminders
feature3.description: Based on event type, location, and real-time traffic, Kaia calculates the optimal time to send you reminders and ensure you arrive on time.

feature4.title: Contextual Suggestions
feature4.description: Kaia learns from your patterns: your preferred meeting times, how much time you usually dedicate to each type of activity, and helps you optimize your schedule.
